list.abs: 不论体循环(systemic circulation)或肺循环(pulmonary circulation),由心室射出的血液都流经由动脉、毛细血管和静脉相互串联构成的血管系统(vascular system),再返回心房.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from modern Latin vascularis, from Latin vasculum (see vasculum)

entry.def: Vascular is used to describe the channels and veins through which fluids pass in the bodies of animals and plants.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,"有……形状或性质的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: cell细胞+ular有……形状或性质的→adj.细胞的
globe球+ular有……形状或性质的→adj.球状的
joc笑话+ular有……形状或性质的→adj.诙谐的
tit=title名义,头衔+ular有……形状或性质的→adj.有名无实的,名义上的

zone区域+ular有……形状或性质的→adj.[解]小带的,小带状的
